mapper.insert: INSERT INTO score(i_id, u_id, score, create_time, edit_time) VALUES (#{item.itemId}, #{user.userId}, #{score}, #{createTime}, #{editTime})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.score_id, s.score, s.edit_time, i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_sex, i.item_unit, i.athlete_amount, se.season_id, se.season_name, se.season_status, u.user_id, u.user_no, u.nickname, u.user_sex, u.t_id FROM ( `score` s INNER JOIN `user` u ON s.u_id = u.user_id ) INNER JOIN `item` i ON s.i_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN `season` se ON i.se_id = se.season_id
AND i.item_id = #{itemId} AND se.season_status=1
ORDER BY s.score ${condition} Limit 3

SELECT s.score_id, s.score, s.edit_time, i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_sex, i.item_unit, i.athlete_amount, u.user_id, u.user_no, u.nickname, u.user_sex, u.t_id FROM ( `score` s INNER JOIN `user` u ON s.u_id = u.user_id ) INNER JOIN `item` i ON s.i_id = i.item_id WHERE s.score_id = #{scoreId}

SELECT s.score_id, s.score, s.edit_time, i.item_id, i.item_name, i.item_sex, i.item_unit, i.athlete_amount, u.user_id, u.user_no, u.nickname, u.user_sex, u.t_id FROM ( `score` s INNER JOIN `user` u ON s.u_id = u.user_id ) INNER JOIN `item` i ON s.i_id = i.item_id WHERE u.user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM `team` INNER JOIN `user` ON `team`.team_id = `user`.t_id WHERE `team`.team_id = #{teamId} )

SELECT t.team_name, u.user_no, u.nickname, u.user_sex, i.item_name, i.item_unit, i.item_place, u2.nickname AS scorer, s.score, s.edit_time FROM `athlete` a INNER JOIN `user` u ON a.u_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN `team` t ON t.team_id = u.t_id INNER JOIN `item` i ON a.i_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN `season` se ON i.se_id = se.season_id INNER JOIN `user` u2 ON i.u_id = u2.user_id LEFT JOIN `score` s ON s.i_id = a.i_id AND s.u_id=a.u_id
AND i.item_id = #{score.item.itemId} AND u.nickname LIKE '%${score.user.nickname}%'
AND se.season_id=#{score.item.season.seasonId}
AND s.score !=0
ORDER BY i.item_name, score
